bibl.title: Three Magical Papyri from the Michigan Collection.
bibl.note: I. Inv. 4451a. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, IV-V AD. - II. Inv. 1560o. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, III-IV AD. - III. Sans No. d'Inv. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, II-III AD.
bibl.seg: 141.4 P. Mich. Inv. 1560o; 4451a; sans No. d'Inv.
Michael Zellmann-Rohrer, Three Magical Papyri from the Michigan Collection.

I. Inv. 4451a. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, IV-V AD. - II. Inv. 1560o. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, III-IV AD. - III. Sans No. d'Inv. Fragment of a magical formulary. Provenance unknown, II-III AD.
